job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are creating a better everyday life for the modern lives of the many people, and we need your help to do it! Our team is building a new Machine Learning Platform to help Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models, Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance. Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design, Platforming for Scale & Optimization. We are in the early phases of establishing the products with an ever evolving landscape with the advent of Generative AI.

   So, if you would like to get in on the ground floor of a fantastic journey to help our co-workers, this is the team to join!

   What you'll need to know

   "At IKEA, you're welcome no matter where you come from, what you believe, and what you look like. We don't even care how you have furnished your home. We're interested in you simply because you're you. Our different views, backgrounds, and personalities make us better understand our customers, give us more fun at work and spark more and better ideas. Perhaps your unique take on something could lead to a great idea that creates a better everyday life for the many people.

   We are looking for an engineer that enjoys building things that make an impact with our customers. Are you excited about technology and want a chance to be part of building better digital products for our customers? Look no further, you have arrived at the right opportunity!

   Our teams come from diverse backgrounds, coming together in the mission of creating a better everyday life for the many people over several touchpoints for the customers. In a true cross functional team with designers, data analysts, engineers, agile coach, and product owner we make this a reality.

   We expect all team members to contribute to good software design principles and keep each other accountable for the principles decided upon in the team. We use these principles to guide the team when looking for new solutions to problems, such as bringing in new tools, frameworks or creating new solutions.

   You relish the opportunity to contribute to the team's internal metrics and the product metrics. You would be part of defining how and what we measure to define success from an engineering perspective.

   Specifically, we are looking for an engineer with experience in building platforms at scale, well versed in - Machine Learning, DevOps and backend!

   A Day In Your Life With Us

   As Software Engineer, your main responsibilities will include:
     * Building software that meets the team's & company's engineering standards.
     * Contribute to all aspects of the platform lifecycle, with a focus on engineering (including new product ideas).
     * Lead and promote good software engineering practices within an agile/iterative development approach to improve time to market and fulfill business needs.
     * Partner closely with engineering manager. Onboard, coach and mentor engineers in order to secure transfer of competence and a high performing team.
     * Design and educate other engineers in ways of working, encouraging good practices to meet consumer expectations on Product or Service delivery.
     * Define solution architecture and contribute to the landscape architecture.
     * Define, maintain, and improve our integration and delivery pipeline.
     * Explore and apply new technologies suitable for our product.
     * Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime, this may include on call duties.
     * Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering.

   What you'll need to have

   Being a greenfield space, you will get to influence the technology landscape in the team. The technology considerations could include (but is not limited to), tech stack used by our sister teams such as:
     * Develop tools, frameworks and custom components to address common needs in machine learning platforms, such as model training, model deployments, model observability, versioning, explain ability, feature store, security, infrastructure etc.
     * Design, Develop, and maintain large scale data and cloud infrastructure required for machine learning projects.
     * Working with CI/CD flow where we strive for total automation of bringing code from a developer to production.
     * Utilize software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments hosted on GCP.
     * Understanding of Large Language Models.
     * Leverage your expertise in working with GCP and Vertex AI as a foundation for scaling AI and ML solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Software engineer - machine learning operations

We are creating a better everyday life for the modern lives of the many people, and we need your help to do it! Our team is building a new Machine Learning Platform to help Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models, Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance. Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design, Platforming for Scale & Optimization. We are in the early phases of establishing the products with an ever evolving landscape with the advent of Generative AI.

   So, if you would like to get in on the ground floor of a fantastic journey to help our co-workers, this is the team to join!

   What you'll need to know

   "At IKEA, you're welcome no matter where you come from, what you believe, and what you look like. We don't even care how you have furnished your home. We're interested in you simply because you're you. Our different views, backgrounds, and personalities make us better understand our customers, give us more fun at work and spark more and better ideas. Perhaps your unique take on something could lead to a great idea that creates a better everyday life for the many people.

   We are looking for an engineer that enjoys building things that make an impact with our customers. Are you excited about technology and want a chance to be part of building better digital products for our customers? Look no further, you have arrived at the right opportunity!

   Our teams come from diverse backgrounds, coming together in the mission of creating a better everyday life for the many people over several touchpoints for the customers. In a true cross functional team with designers, data analysts, engineers, agile coach, and product owner we make this a reality.

   We expect all team members to contribute to good software design principles and keep each other accountable for the principles decided upon in the team. We use these principles to guide the team when looking for new solutions to problems, such as bringing in new tools, frameworks or creating new solutions.

   You relish the opportunity to contribute to the team's internal metrics and the product metrics. You would be part of defining how and what we measure to define success from an engineering perspective.

   Specifically, we are looking for an engineer with experience in building platforms at scale, well versed in - Machine Learning, DevOps and backend!

   A Day In Your Life With Us

   As Software Engineer, your main responsibilities will include:
     * Building software that meets the team's & company's engineering standards.
     * Contribute to all aspects of the platform lifecycle, with a focus on engineering (including new product ideas).
     * Lead and promote good software engineering practices within an agile/iterative development approach to improve time to market and fulfill business needs.
     * Partner closely with engineering manager. Onboard, coach and mentor engineers in order to secure transfer of competence and a high performing team.
     * Design and educate other engineers in ways of working, encouraging good practices to meet consumer expectations on Product or Service delivery.
     * Define solution architecture and contribute to the landscape architecture.
     * Define, maintain, and improve our integration and delivery pipeline.
     * Explore and apply new technologies suitable for our product.
     * Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime, this may include on call duties.
     * Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering.

   What you'll need to have

   Being a greenfield space, you will get to influence the technology landscape in the team. The technology considerations could include (but is not limited to), tech stack used by our sister teams such as:
     * Develop tools, frameworks and custom components to address common needs in machine learning platforms, such as model training, model deployments, model observability, versioning, explain ability, feature store, security, infrastructure etc.
     * Design, Develop, and maintain large scale data and cloud infrastructure required for machine learning projects.
     * Working with CI/CD flow where we strive for total automation of bringing code from a developer to production.
     * Utilize software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments hosted on GCP.
     * Understanding of Large Language Models.
     * Leverage your expertise in working with GCP and Vertex AI as a foundation for scaling AI and ML solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and maintaining a Machine Learning Platform with a focus on improving time to market, standardization, compliance, auditability, scale, and optimization. It explicitly mentions 'Machine Learning Operations', 'DevOps', and 'backend' experience. The responsibilities include developing tools for model training, deployment, observability, versioning, and feature stores, which are core to MLOps. While Generative AI is mentioned as an evolving landscape, the primary focus and listed responsibilities align more closely with the broader ML Engineer profile, particularly the 'Operations Engineering (MLOps)' aspect, rather than a specialized GenAI Engineer role. The mention of GCP and Vertex AI further supports a cloud-based ML infrastructure focus.

job_tasks.justification: The job description repeatedly mentions 'Machine Learning Operations', 'DevOps', 'CI/CD flow', 'automation of bringing code from a developer to production', 'integration and delivery pipeline', and 'runtime'. It also details developing tools for model deployments, versioning, and observability, all core MLOps activities.

The role is described as building a Machine Learning Platform to 'Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models' and 'Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design, Platforming for Scale & Optimization', which are key goals of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models, Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance. Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design, Platforming for Scale & Optimization.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires 'Building software that meets the team's & company's engineering standards', 'Contribute to all aspects of the platform lifecycle, with a focus on engineering', 'Lead and promote good software engineering practices', 'Define solution architecture and contribute to the landscape architecture', and 'Utilize software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments'.
job_tasks.phrase: Building software that meets the team's & company's engineering standards.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Partner closely with engineering manager. Onboard, coach and mentor engineers in order to secure transfer of competence and a high performing team.' and 'Design and educate other engineers in ways of working, encouraging good practices to meet consumer expectations on Product or Service delivery.'
job_tasks.phrase: Onboard, coach and mentor engineers in order to secure transfer of competence and a high performing team.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves defining 'solution architecture' and contributing to 'landscape architecture', which are fundamental software design and development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Define solution architecture and contribute to the landscape architecture.

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'Define, maintain, and improve our integration and delivery pipeline' is a direct MLOps task.
job_tasks.phrase: Define, maintain, and improve our integration and delivery pipeline.

job_tasks.justification: Taking 'responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime, this may include on call duties' encompasses the full lifecycle management of a production system, including operational aspects.
job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime, this may include on call duties.

job_tasks.justification: Continuously nurturing skills towards 'system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering' directly relates to the operational and engineering aspects of an ML platform.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions developing tools for 'model training' and 'model observability', which are core modeling activities within an ML platform context.

The description explicitly states the need to develop tools for 'model deployments, model observability, versioning, explain ability, feature store, security, infrastructure etc.' within the ML platform.
job_tasks.phrase: model deployments, model observability, versioning, explain ability, feature store, security, infrastructure etc.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves the responsibility to 'Design, Develop, and maintain large scale data and cloud infrastructure required for machine learning projects.'
job_tasks.phrase: Design, Develop, and maintain large scale data and cloud infrastructure required for machine learning projects.

job_tasks.justification: Working with 'CI/CD flow where we strive for total automation of bringing code from a developer to production' is a fundamental MLOps practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Working with CI/CD flow where we strive for total automation of bringing code from a developer to production.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires utilizing 'software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments'.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilize software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions 'Understanding of Large Language Models', indicating involvement with generative models.
The role involves leveraging expertise in 'GCP and Vertex AI as a foundation for scaling AI and ML solutions', which includes managing the data and cloud infrastructure for ML projects.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage your expertise in working with GCP and Vertex AI as a foundation for scaling AI and ML solutions.

job_tasks.justification: The job description states the team's mission is 'creating a better everyday life for the modern lives of the many people' and 'building better digital products for our customers', indicating a focus on business impact and customer needs.
job_tasks.phrase: creating a better everyday life for the modern lives of the many people

job_tasks.justification: The role aims to 'Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models' and 'fulfill business needs', directly linking technical work to business objectives.

The job description mentions building a 'Machine Learning Platform' to 'Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance' and 'Auditability by Design', which are operational and governance aspects of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance. Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions developing tools for 'feature store', which is a component often associated with managing data for ML models.

Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime
Explore and apply new technologies suitable for our product.
Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering.
We use these principles to guide the team when looking for new solutions to problems, such as bringing in new tools, frameworks or creating new solutions.
You relish the opportunity to contribute to the team's internal metrics and the product metrics.
